isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - RELAY VALVE (BENDIX R-12 AND R-14) - DISASSEMBLE

svcproc.title: DISASSEMBLE

note.para: Prior to disassembly, mark the location of the mounting bracket to the cover and the cover to the body.

svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 54 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove the four (4) cover capscrews (Item 2) and lockwashers securing the cover (Item 3) to the body.
Remove the cover, sealing ring (Item 4) and mounting bracket.
Remove the piston (Item 6) and piston O-ring (Item 5) from the body.
While depressing the exhaust cover, remove the retaining ring and slowly relax the spring beneath the exhaust cover.
Remove the exhaust cover assembly and O-rings.
Remove the inlet/exhaust valve return spring (Item 14) from the body.
Remove the inlet/exhaust valve (Item 10) from the body.
Remove the valve retainer from the inlet/exhaust valve.
Remove the service port cap nut and O-ring from the R-14.
Remove the diaphragm from the R-14 cover.
